Module ZiqiYang
Package org.ziqi.gameEngine.viewPlayer

Interface ViewPlayer

All Known Implementing Classes:
ScreenPlayer, ViewAdapter
public interface ViewPlayer
ViewPlayer interface to be implemented by ScreenPlayer and ViewAdapter to initialize screens(Stage).
This follows an adapter design pattern by ViewAdapter and ScreenPlayer.
Author:
Ziqi Yang
See Also:
ScreenPlayer, ViewAdapter

    Fields

    static java.lang.String POP_UP_SCREEN

    Constant string value specifying the screen type of view to be shown.

  • Method Details

    • initScreen

      void initScreen​(GameScreen gameScreen, java.lang.String screenType)
      Initializes and shows the screen(view) by given GameScreen object and its type.
      Parameters:
      gameScreen - The GameScreen object to be shown.
      screenType - String value specifying the type of screen to be shown; If SCREEN, then screenPlayer is used; Otherwise, ViewAdapter is used.
      See Also:
      ScreenPlayer.initScreen(GameScreen, String), ViewAdapter.initScreen(GameScreen, String)
